item.title: CVC和ADIA再次出价54亿英镑收购Hargreaves Lansdown
item.description: 一批私募股权买家对 Hargreaves Lansdown Plc 提出了新的收购要约，对该投资平台的估值为 54 亿英镑（69 亿美元）。【原文：A group of private equity buyers have made a fresh bid for Hargreaves Lansdown Plc that values the investment platform at £5.4 billion ($6.9 billion).】

item.title: 零售销售疲软显示消费者脆弱，国债收益率下滑
item.description: 在疲软的美国零售销售数据增强了美联储今年开始降息的预期之后，国债市场反弹。【原文：The Treasury market rallied after weak US retail sales data bolstered expectations for Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts beginning this year.】

item.title: 加拿大保持银行资本水平稳定，称家庭债务风险稳定
item.description: 加拿大金融监管机构维持该国最大银行的资本要求不变，这表明官员们相信这些银行的资产负债表足以抵御经济动荡。【原文：Canada’s financial regulator left capital requirements unchanged for the country’s largest banks, signaling that officials believe their balance sheets are strong enough to withstand economic turbulence.】

item.title: 斯道拉公司首席执行官表示将投资 1 亿欧元生产木质电动汽车电池
item.description: 斯道拉恩索公司（Stora Enso Oyj）首席执行官表示，该公司将投资约 1 亿欧元（约合 1.1 亿美元）开展一个开创性项目，在电动汽车电池中使用木材，以替代目前在中国制造的零部件。【原文：Stora Enso Oyj will invest about €100 million ($110 million) in a pioneering project to use wood in electric vehicle batteries and offer an alternative to components currently made in China, according to its chief executive officer】

item.title: 达斯称印度通胀以 "非常 "缓慢的速度放缓
item.description: 印度储备银行行长达斯（Shaktikanta Das）周二表示，印度的通胀率持续低迷，因此印度央行讨论改变货币政策立场的时机尚不成熟。【原文：India’s inflation continues to be sticky, making it premature for the central bank to discuss a change in its monetary policy stance, Reserve Bank Governor Shaktikanta Das said Tuesday.】

item.title: Norinchukin 将出售 630 亿美元主权债券以减少损失
item.description: 据日本农业银行发言人称，Norinchukin 银行计划出售大约 10 万亿日元（630 亿美元）的美国和欧洲主权债券，以避免因错误押注利率而造成损失。【原文：Norinchukin Bank plans to sell roughly 10 trillion yen ($63 billion) in US and European sovereign bonds to stem losses from wrong-way bets on interest rates, according to a spokesperson for the Japanese agriculture bank.】

item.title: 瑞典的核能目标具有挑战性但可以实现
item.description: 瑞典政府的目标是在下一个十年中期实现新的核电能力上线，这是一个巨大的挑战，但瑞典振兴原子能的协调员表示，这个目标是可以实现的。【原文：The Swedish government’s goal of getting new nuclear power capacity online by the middle of the next decade is a big challenge, but one that’s attainable, according to the nation’s coordinator for the drive to revive atomic energy.】

item.title: 沃达丰寻求以最高 11 亿美元的价格出售 Indus Towers 股份
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社获得的交易条款，沃达丰集团（Vodafone Group Plc）正寻求通过大宗交易出售印度 Indus Towers Ltd. 公司 9.94% 的股份，这家总部位于英国的运营商正继续精简其投资组合。【原文：Vodafone Group Plc is looking to sell 9.94% in India’s Indus Towers Ltd. in block trades, according to terms of the deal obtained by Bloomberg News, as the UK-based carrier continues to streamline its portfolio.】

item.title: 匈牙利在货币宽松周期即将结束之际放缓降息步伐
item.description: 在对福林下跌的担忧日益加剧之后，匈牙利放慢了关键利率的下调步伐，因为决策者们发出信号，央行长达一年多的货币宽松周期已接近尾声。【原文：Hungary slowed the pace of key interest rate cuts after mounting concern over a drop in the forint, as policymakers signaled that the central bank was nearing the end of its more than yearlong monetary-easing cycle.】

item.title: 尽管承诺加强产量限制，俄罗斯原油流量仍在攀升
item.description:
海运出口已恢复了近期跌幅的约三分之一

。【原文：

Seaborne exports have recovered about one-third of their recent decline

】

item.title: 俄罗斯大亨的美国制裁银行扩大对华服务
item.description: 受到美国和欧盟制裁的俄罗斯最大私营贷款公司在扩大了对中国企业的客户支持服务后，正计划在中国开设新的办事处。【原文：Russia’s largest private lender, sanctioned by both the US and the European Union, is planning to open new offices in China after it expanded client support services for Chinese businesses.】

item.title: 史蒂夫-科恩的 Point72 准备成立以人工智能股票为目标的新对冲基金
item.description: 据知情人士透露，史蒂夫-科恩（Steve Cohen）的 Point72 资产管理公司（Point72 Asset Management）正寻求为一家专注于人工智能的新选股对冲基金筹集约 10 亿美元资金。【原文：Steve Cohen’s Point72 Asset Management is seeking to raise about $1 billion for a new stock-picking hedge fund focused on artificial intelligence, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长金多斯认为预测会议是利率变动的关键
item.description: 欧洲中央银行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）表示，以季度预测为特色的会议将是决定利率的关键。【原文：European Central Bank Vice President Luis de Guindos suggested that meetings featuring quarterly forecasts will be key for major decisions to set interest rates.】

item.title: 欧盟黑海小麦因丰收比竞争对手便宜
item.description: 黑海沿岸欧盟国家的小麦交易价格低于竞争对手的商品，因为该地区的大丰收有助于压低价格。【原文：Wheat from European Union countries bordering the Black Sea is trading cheaper than the commodity from competitors, as bumper crops in the region help push down prices.】

item.title: 法国在欧元信贷中的主导地位让市场任由投票决定
item.description: 埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统上周意外当选，凸显了法国在欧洲信贷市场的突出地位。【原文：President Emmanuel Macron’s surprise election call last week has highlighted France’s prominence in European credit markets.】

item.title: 印尼不能忽视电池金属繁荣的代价
item.description:
这个东南亚国家的镍产量约占全球产量的一半，但这需要付出一定的代价。【原文：

The Southeast Asia nation accounts for roughly half of global nickel production, but there’s a price to pay.

】

item.title: Finma 称汇丰私人银行违反洗钱规则
item.description: 瑞士银行业监管机构称，汇丰控股公司的瑞士私人银行未能对政治公众人物拥有的 "高风险 "账户进行充分检查，以防止洗钱活动。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc’s Swiss private bank failed to carry out adequate checks on ‘high-risk’ accounts owned by politically-exposed persons designed to prevent money laundering, Switzerland’s banking regulator said.】

item.title: 指数纳入前印度债券资金回流至 100 亿美元
item.description: 在四月份印度债券遭到抛售之后，外国投资者在月底印度债券被纳入一个重要的全球指数之前，又重新回到了印度债券的怀抱。【原文：Foreign investors are returning to Indian bonds after a selloff in April, ahead of the debt’s inclusion into a key global index at the month-end.】

item.title: 股票销售额突破 7 亿美元，英伟达内部人士趁势套现
item.description: 今年以来，Nvidia 公司内部人士已经抛售了价值超过 7 亿美元的股票，因为在对其芯片的持续需求下，该公司股价不断创下新高。【原文：Nvidia Corp. insiders have sold shares worth more than $700 million this year as the stock continues to push deeper into record territory amid unrelenting demand for its chips.】

item.title: 苏黎世将以约 1 亿欧元出售马德里市中心办公楼
item.description: 苏黎世保险集团同意以约 1 亿欧元（1.07 亿美元）的价格将其位于马德里市中心的标志性办公楼出售给一家西班牙投资基金，这凸显了该市对房地产的强劲需求。【原文：Zurich Insurance Group agreed to sell its iconic office building in downtown Madrid to a Spanish investment fund for about €100 million ($107 million), underscoring the robust demand for real estate in the city.】

item.title: 美联储研究显示，私营企业利润超过上市公司
item.description: 旧金山联邦储备银行的研究人员指出，在过去四十年里，上市公司的利润随着利率的下降而下降，而私营企业的利润率则 "大幅 "攀升。【原文：Publicly traded companies’ profits fell along with interest rates over the last four decades, while profit rates for privately-held firms climbed “substantially,” according to researchers for the Federal Reserve Bank of San Francisco.】

item.title: 南非股市大涨暗示大选后情绪转向
item.description: 南非股票基准涨幅创下今年之最，表明投资者在经历了三年来最长的连续单日资金外流之后，开始看好南非的股票市场。兰特和政府债券大涨。【原文：South Africa’s stock benchmark rallied the most this year, suggesting investors are turning positive on the nation’s equities after the longest daily streak of outflows in three years. The rand and government bonds surged.】

item.title: AQR 庆祝可转换套利在高利率时代卷土重来
item.description: AQR 资本管理公司（AQR Capital Management）称，一种利用可转换为股票的债务的利基策略有了复苏的空间，因为这种在金融危机期间被击溃的著名交易正在卷土重来。【原文：AQR Capital Management says the resurgence of a niche strategy riding debt that can convert into equity has room to run, as a trade that was famously routed during the financial crisis enjoys a big comeback.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。科技股涨势不减，美元逼近 2024 年高点，高盛（Goldman Sachs）称美国就业市场正处于拐点。以下是交易员们正在谈论的话题。【原文：Good morning. The tech rally rumbles on, the dollar flirts with its 2024 high and Goldman Sachs says the US jobs market is at an inflection point. Here’s what traders are talking about. — David Goodman】

item.title: 贝恩称奢侈品牌涨价疏远了购物者
item.description: 贝恩咨询公司（Bain & Co.【原文：Surging prices of luxury goods have turned off some shoppers and will likely force labels to rethink both the increases and their wider product offerings, said Bain & Co.】

item.title: 文件显示马斯克的 X 计划如何成为下一个 Venmo
item.description:
州政府的许可证申请让人们对公司的计划以及埃隆时代的财务困境有了新的认识。【原文：

State license applications give new insight into the company’s plans, as well as its financial woes during the Elon era.

】

item.title: 卡莱尔航空测试暂停两年后重燃的飞机 ABS 市场
item.description: 在阔别资产支持证券市场两年之后，凯雷航空合伙公司（Carlyle Aviation Partners）重返市场，推出了以商用飞机为支持的债券销售。【原文：After a two-year absence from the asset-backed securities market, Carlyle Aviation Partners is returning with a bond sale backed by commercial aircraft, a market where issuance could keep climbing as new plane sales come under pressure.】

item.title: 智利央行可能会加快降息步伐
item.description: 智利央行可能会在连续第三次会议上放慢降息步伐，因为决策者们正在考虑即将到来的电价上调对通胀前景的影响，而通胀前景仍在目标范围内。【原文：Chile’s central bank will likely slow the pace of its interest rate cuts for the third straight meeting as policymakers mull the impact of coming electricity hikes on an inflation outlook that’s remained at target.】

item.title: 金鹅上市定价接近区间下限
item.description: 根据彭博社看到的条款，奢侈运动鞋品牌金鹅集团（Golden Goose Group SpA）的首次公开募股定价为每股 9.75 欧元，接近市场定价区间的下限。【原文：Luxury sneaker brand Golden Goose Group SpA priced its initial public offering at €9.75 a share, near the bottom end of a marketed range, according to terms seen by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 前德意志银行高管将南非连锁医院转向诊断领域
item.description: 生命医疗集团控股有限公司（Life Healthcare Group Holdings Ltd.）首席执行官彼得-沃顿-胡德（Peter Wharton-Hood）正在将这家南非市值最大的连锁医院转向诊断和医疗保健服务领域，因为临床入院人数已趋于稳定。【原文：Peter Wharton-Hood, the chief executive officer of Life Healthcare Group Holdings Ltd., is pivoting the biggest South African hospital chain by market value to diagnostics and health-care services as clinical admissions plateau.】
